metadata.Title: CVE-2022-37599 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A Regular expression denial of service (ReDoS) flaw was found in Function interpolateName in interpolateName.js in webpack loader-utils 2.0.0 via the resourcePath variable in interpolateName.js.

criterions.comment: node-loader-utils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
